question: What is the name of the Hackathon to be organised by Electronics Ministry, IEEE, National Informatics Centre and Oracle?
explanation:
“Gov TechThon 2020” is the Hackathon proposed to be conducted by Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY), National Informatics Centre (NIC), IEEE Computer Society and Oracle.
The hackathon would be held from 30th October to 01st November 2020. The hackathon aims to foster new ideas, boost innovation and enhance the use technology in agriculture and allied sectors.
